docs.snippet: There are some novels that write themselves. The author simply introduces you to the characters, sees that you are on terms of intimale acquaintance with the hero and heroine, and then steps behind the curtain. Tho work then goes on in a natural way.
docs.lead_paragraph: There are some novels that write themselves. The author simply introduces you to the characters, sees that you are on terms of intimale acquaintance with the hero and heroine, and then steps behind the curtain. Tho work then goes on in a natural way.

headline.main: The Butler Expedition A Card from the Officers of the Twelfth Maine Regiment.

docs.lead_paragraph: We cannot allow the steamer Constitution to depart without availing ourselves of the opportunity of expressing on behalf of the troops under our command our deep sense of gratitude for the obligations we are under to the Sanitary Commission for many articles for hospital use of indispensable necessity for the health and comfort of a large body of troops on this transport.

headline.main: NEWS FROM ALBANY.; The Hearing in the Broadway Railroad Case Debate before the Committee The Public Defence Bill The Public Health of New-York, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: Whatever the advocates or opponents of the Broadway Railroad may have to say when the House Committee make their report upon the bill now before them, they cannot complain that they have not had a patient hearing; for no Committee, not possessed of the most exemplary patience, would have consented to sit, as this one did, from 4 o'clock until after 9 in the evening, listening to arguments long...

headline.main: THE COLORED ORPHANS' HOME.; A Notice of the Institution Its Benefactions and its Beneficiaries.

docs.lead_paragraph: In review of the numerous public institutions monumental of our citizens' far-reaching benevolence, stands one which, save in circles immediately interested, is rarely talked of, yet which, from the peculiarity of its associations, is singularly interesting. If one had never visited it a Southerner, for instance, who had never dreamed of such an establishment and were shown the curious and remarkably impressive stereoscopic views which are here...

headline.main: MISCELLANEOUS REBELLION NEWS.; AFFAIRS AT FORT MONROE.

docs.snippet: The Memphis Appeal learns from a lady friend that a project is on foot among the gentler sex of Memphis to organize a "broomstick battalion," for the especial protection of such young gentlemen as are indisposed to enlist for the protection of their...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Memphis Appeal learns from a lady friend that a project is on foot among the gentler sex of Memphis to organize a "broomstick battalion," for the especial protection of such young gentlemen as are indisposed to enlist for the protection of their country. Nice young men, that attend "small teaparties," wear kid gloves, and have their hair dressed five or six times a week by the barber, will receive their particular attention.

headline.main: American Geographical Society.; SANITARY SCIENCE BY DR. BELLOWS.

docs.lead_paragraph: The above body met in full numbers on Tuesday evening, with many eminent guests in attendance to hear the address of Rev. H.H. BELLOWS on the subject of the "Importance of Sanitary Science as illustrated in the experience of recent Wars abroad and at home."

headline.main: THURLOW WEED ON THE IMPRISONMENTS IN AMERICA.
